title: Bang Bang Racing THD v1.0 all device Android
description:
Bang Bang Racing v1.0 all device 
Requirements: Android 2.3
Overview: Bang Bang Racing THD is a fun, action-packed racing game that has cool visuals and pumped-up sports cars. 


But underneath its playful exterior, it has the pumping heart of a true racing game. Real-time dynamic physics allow for finesse and control - drifting through corners and clipping every apex delivers huge player satisfaction.
The game also features a unique control system allowing you to simply point where you want the car to go, as if you are drawing a racing line for the car to follow.
